### cfiDefCfaOffset() {#abbe481ab35db0dcfa03f9f5bbabb9def}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static MCCFIInstruction llvm::MCCFIInstruction::cfiDefCfaOffset (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42; L, int64&#95;t Offset, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> Loc=&#123;&#125;)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
.cfi&#95;def&#95;cfa&#95;offset modifies a rule for computing CFA.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> remains the same, but offset is new. Note that it is the absolute offset that will be added to a defined register to the compute CFA address.

### createRelOffset() {#ae4f57b410a806f657695bfb7e19400c0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static MCCFIInstruction llvm::MCCFIInstruction::createRelOffset (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42; L, unsigned Register, int64&#95;t Offset, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> Loc=&#123;&#125;)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
.cfi&#95;rel&#95;offset Previous value of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> is saved at offset Offset from the current CFA register.

This is transformed to .cfi&#95;offset using the known displacement of the CFA register from the CFA.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcdwarf-h/#l00625">625</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcdwarf-h">MCDwarf.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
